alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 2:21PM MDT until June 07 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTY... At 221 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rockerville, or 9 miles southwest of Rapid City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Rapid City, Keystone, Hayward, Rockerville, Bear Country, Keystone Wye, Hart Ranch, Reptile Gardens and Mount Rushmore National Memorial. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
